name: Evervolve
description:
My Participation Project for the 24th edition of ScoreSpace.

Unfortunately i could've worked on this game for only one day and a half, so i managed to implement only half of the features i wanted to add.

I hope you still get to enjoy the game!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Evolution Screen

Mouse - Shoot

(P.S. The Game is VEERY buggy,  i couldn't have fleshed out everything, i am fully prepared for the harsh judging)
